amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Village; dissolution; election; form of ballot.
amendatorysection.para: The form of the ballot for the question of the abolishment of incorporation of a village shall be, respectively, For abolishment of incorporation, and Against abolishment of incorporation, and the same shall be printed upon a separate ballot and shall be counted and canvassed in the same manner as other ballots voted at the election.
